JobFullDesc:
Who are we looking for

We seek a hardworking Senior Software Engineer to help develop robust advanced analytics and machine learning solutions that have a direct impact on the business. You should have experience in Python; a strong background in algorithms and data structures; hands-on AWS experience; as well as experience in database technology (e.g. Postgres, Redis), data processing technology (e.g. EMR), and familiarity with cloud infrastructure. As well, you should have a proven history of conceiving, executing, and delivering strategically important technology projects. As a Principal Engineer, you’ll be expected to articulate a technology vision aligned to a critical business outcome, and to act as a technical leader to the teams involved in delivering that vision. Strong interpersonal skills are crucial for this role as you will be required to communicate your technical vision both down to individual team members and up to senior leaders for buy-in.

What will you work on

If this is you, you’ll be working with the Advanced Analytics and Machine Learning (AAML) team at Nike. With teammates in Portland, Boston, China, and Poland, you’ll be joining a global organization working to solve machine learning problems at scale. You’ll be crafting and implementing scalable applications that use prediction models and optimization programs to deliver data driven decisions that result in immense business impact. You’ll also chip in to core advanced analytics and machine learning platforms and tools to enable both prediction and optimization model development. You thrive when surrounded by talented colleagues and seek to never stop learning. We are looking for candidates who enjoy a team and academic environment where we develop and share new skills, mentor, and share knowledge and software back to the analytics and engineering communities both within Nike and at-large.
We value and cultivate our culture by seeking to always be collaborative, intellectually curious, fun, open, and diverse.

Who will you work with

In this role, you’ll be working closely with the rest of our global team, along with Commercial and Consumer Analytics, Enterprise Architecture, and Solution Architecture. This role reports to a Director of Engineering on the AAML team.
